components.title: AboutSaleorDescription
components.context: This segment provides a textual description of Saleor, highlighting its key features and benefits.
components.code:
About
1 Saleor is a rapidly growing all-out commerce API. Saleor is fully open-source, and 100% focused on the GraphQL interface. Our mission is to provide unparalleled extensibility. 2 We make it easy for front-end teams to prototype fast, experiment, and build wonderful, unrestricted storefront experiences . 3 We enable developers to extend Saleor easily via [Saleor Apps](https://github.com/saleor/saleor-app-template), a robust tally of async/sync webhooks, and a composable Dashboard. 4 We allow brands to own their data and go fast while staying fully flexible with Saleor Cloud.
